short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: This extensions allows InfoNotary e-Doc Signer to be used for digital signing from web sites.
short.bg: Това разширение позволява използването на InfoNotary e-Doc Signer за подписване от браузъра.

long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: This extension allows web sites to use Infonotary e-Doc Signer to generate digitally signatures. Desktop app supports certificates installed on smart cards or in Windows certificate store.
